00019 // struct constructor
00020 MirroredSlaveInterface::RemapAddress::RemapAddress(QDomNode& remapNode):
00021 remapAddress_(), prompt_(QString("Base Address:")), state_(),
00022 remapAttributes_() {
00023         remapAddress_ = remapNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00024 
00025         // get the attributes
00026         General::parseAttributes(remapNode, remapAttributes_);
00027 
00028         QMap<QString, QString>::iterator i = remapAttributes_.find(
00029                         QString("spirit:prompt"));
00030         // did the prompt attribute exist
00031         if (i != remapAttributes_.end()) {
00032 
00033                 // save the attribute value and remove it from QMap to avoid
00034                 // duplicates
00035                 prompt_ = i.value();
00036                 remapAttributes_.erase(i);
00037         }
00038         i = remapAttributes_.find(QString("spirit:state"));
00039         if (i != remapAttributes_.end()) {
00040 
00041                 // save the attribute value and remove it from QMap to avoid
00042                 // duplicates
00043                 state_ = i.value();
00044                 remapAttributes_.erase(i);
00045         }
00046         return;
00047 }
00048 
00049 // the constructor
00050 MirroredSlaveInterface::MirroredSlaveInterface(QDomNode& mirrorNode):
00051                                 range_(), rangeAttributes_(), remapAddresses_() {
00052         QDomNode baseAddrNode;
00053         bool baseAddressFound = false;
00054 
00055         // find the spirit:baseAddresses node and start the parsing from it
00056         for (int i = 0; i < mirrorNode.childNodes().count(); ++i) {
00057                 if (mirrorNode.childNodes().at(i).nodeName() ==
00058                                 QString("spirit:baseAddresses")) {
00059                         baseAddrNode = mirrorNode.childNodes().at(i);
00060                         baseAddressFound = true;
00061                 }
00062         }
00063         // if the optional spirit:baseAddresses node was not found theres nothing
00064         // to parse
00065         if (!baseAddressFound) {
00066                 return;
00067         }
00068 
00069         // start parsing
00070         for (int i = 0; i < baseAddrNode.childNodes().count(); ++i) {
00071                 QDomNode tempNode = baseAddrNode.childNodes().at(i);
00072 
00073                 if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:remapAddress")) {
00074                         remapAddresses_.append(
00075                                         QSharedPointer<MirroredSlaveInterface::RemapAddress>(
00076                                                         new MirroredSlaveInterface::RemapAddress(tempNode)));
00077                 }
00078 
00079                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:range")) {
00080                         range_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00081 
00082                         // get attributes
00083                         General::parseAttributes(tempNode, rangeAttributes_);
00084                 }
00085         }
00086 
00087         // if mandatory elements are not found
00088 
00089         if (remapAddresses_.size() == 0) {
00090                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element spirit:remapAddress"
00091                                 " missing in spirit:baseAddresses"));
00092         }
00093 
00094         else if (range_.isNull()) {
00095                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory elemet range missing in "
00096                                 " spirit:baseAddresses"));
00097         }
00098         return;
00099 }

00101 MirroredSlaveInterface::MirroredSlaveInterface():
00102 range_(), rangeAttributes_(), remapAddresses_(){
00103 }

00105 MirroredSlaveInterface::MirroredSlaveInterface( const MirroredSlaveInterface& other ):
00106 range_(other.range_),
00107 rangeAttributes_(other.rangeAttributes_),
00108 remapAddresses_() {
00109 
00110         foreach (QSharedPointer<RemapAddress> remapAddr, other.remapAddresses_) {
00111                 if (remapAddr) {
00112                         QSharedPointer<RemapAddress> copy = QSharedPointer<RemapAddress>(
00113                                 new RemapAddress(*remapAddr.data()));
00114                         remapAddresses_.append(copy);
00115                 }
00116         }
00117 }

00120 MirroredSlaveInterface& MirroredSlaveInterface::operator=( const MirroredSlaveInterface& other ) {
00121         if (this != &other) {
00122 
00123                 range_ = other.range_;
00124                 rangeAttributes_ = other.rangeAttributes_;
00125 
00126                 remapAddresses_.clear();
00127                 foreach (QSharedPointer<RemapAddress> remapAddr, other.remapAddresses_) {
00128                         if (remapAddr) {
00129                                 QSharedPointer<RemapAddress> copy = QSharedPointer<RemapAddress>(
00130                                         new RemapAddress(*remapAddr.data()));
00131                                 remapAddresses_.append(copy);
00132                         }
00133                 }
00134         }
00135         return *this;
00136 }

00139 // the destructor
00140 MirroredSlaveInterface::~MirroredSlaveInterface() {
00141         remapAddresses_.clear();
00142 }

00144 void MirroredSlaveInterface::write(QXmlStreamWriter& writer) {
00145         writer.writeStartElement("spirit:mirroredSlave");
00146 
00147         // if theres a base address defined
00148         if (remapAddresses_.size() != 0) {
00149                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:baseAddresses");
00150 
00151                 // write all spirit:remapAddress elements
00152                 for (int i = 0; i < remapAddresses_.size(); ++i) {
00153                         writer.writeStartElement("spirit:remapAddress");
00154 
00155                         // if mandatory element is not empty
00156                         if (!remapAddresses_.at(i)->prompt_.isEmpty()) {
00157 
00158                                 writer.writeAttribute("spirit:prompt",
00159                                                 remapAddresses_.at(i)->prompt_);
00160                         }
00161 
00162                         // if mandatory element is not empty
00163                         if (!remapAddresses_.at(i)->state_.isEmpty()) {
00164                                 writer.writeAttribute("spirit:state",
00165                                                 remapAddresses_.at(i)->state_);
00166                         }
00167 
00168                         // write rest of the attributes
00169                         General::writeAttributes(writer,
00170                                         remapAddresses_.at(i)->remapAttributes_);
00171 
00172                         writer.writeCharacters(remapAddresses_.at(i)->remapAddress_);
00173                         writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:remapAddress
00174                 }
00175 
00176                 if (!range_.isEmpty()) {
00177                         writer.writeStartElement("spirit:range");
00178                         General::writeAttributes(writer, rangeAttributes_);
00179 
00180                         writer.writeCharacters(range_);
00181                         writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:range
00182                 }
00183 
00184                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:baseAddresses
00185         }
00186 
00187         writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:mirroredSlave
00188 }

00208 void MirroredSlaveInterface::setRemapAddresses(const
00209                 QList<QSharedPointer<RemapAddress> >& remapAddresses) {
00210         // delete old remapAddresses
00211         remapAddresses_.clear();
00212 
00213         // save new remapAddresses
00214         remapAddresses_ = remapAddresses;
00215 }
